column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I didn't know what to expect so was very surprised to see how packed it was. The hostess told us the wait would be about 15 min
column2: and we were fine with sitting at the bar up front if that's faster
column3: but we did get seated in about 10 min. We got a cozy booth for 2. I did notice there were 2 community tables in the center
column4: which I like because that means you can have big groups
column5: or it might be fun to share the table with strangers. Maybe.
